technologies.name: React
technologies.description: Underlying framework and the core of the project.

technologies.name: Tailwind CSS
technologies.description: Utility-first CSS framework used to style the project.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: Superset of JavaScript with strong typing support used to ensure the type safety of the project.

technologies.name: Python
technologies.description: Used to build the data gathering parts of the open source project.

preview.description: Electricity Maps provides actionable electricity data for more than 160 regions around the globe. The company mission is to help businesses and organizations more effectively reduce their carbon emissions, and enable products and services that empower end-users to be more carbon conscious.

details.tagline: The leading resource for 24/7 electricity COâ‚‚ data
details.description: I work as a Open Source Community Engineer at Electricity Maps. The Electricity Maps code base can be divided into 3 parts, our app, data gathering and backend. The app and data gathering together make up the open source project which I am responsible for maintaining. Since my primary duties are focused on maintaining the open source parts of our code I primarily work on reviewing Pull Requests from community members as well as others on the team and doing triage on issues. I also work on code directly such as creating and ensuring our CI pipeline is up to date and maintained not to mention the creation of new parsers so we can add new regions to our app and API. I also help out with shaping and implementing new features that span across the entire code base.

technologies.name: Svelte
technologies.description: Underlying framework and the core of the project.

technologies.name: SvelteKit
technologies.description: Meta framework for Svelte with built in static site generator and routing.

technologies.name: Tailwind CSS
technologies.description: Utility-first CSS framework used to style the project.

technologies.name: Skeleton
technologies.description: UI toolkit based on TailwindCSS and SvelteKit that provides built in components and a theming system.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: Superset of JavaScript with strong typing support used to ensure the type safety of the project.

technologies.name: GitHub Actions
technologies.description: CI/CD pipeline used to automatically test and build the project on GitHub Pages when changes are pushed. It employs caching and parallelization to speed up the test and build process.

technologies.name: GitHub Pages
technologies.description: Static site hosting service used to host the project. The project is deployed on GitHub Pages using the CI/CD pipeline when there are changes to the main branch.

preview.description: Online portfolio to showcase the projects I've worked on and the frameworks and tools I used on these projects. The portfolio is built with Svelte, SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, Skeleton and TypeScript.

details.tagline: My online portfolio to showcase some of the projects I've worked on and the frameworks and tools I used to build them.
details.description: The portfolio was built with Svelte, SvelteKit, TailwindCSS, Skeleton and TypeScript. And is deployed and hosted on GitHub Pages using an automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions to automatically publish the latest changes.

technologies.name: Angular
technologies.description: Underlying framework and the core of the project.

technologies.name: Angular CLI
technologies.description: CLI utility for creating components, modules and services. It also has features that enabling rapid prototyping with a built in dev server as well as creating full production builds.

technologies.name: Angular Material
technologies.description: Angular specific implementation of the Material Design Framework.

technologies.name: Angular Fire
technologies.description: Angular specific implementation of the Firebase SDK. It provides a set of Angular services that can be used to interact with Firebase.

technologies.name: Firebase
technologies.description: Backend as a service (BaaS) that provides a set of tools and services to build and run web and mobile applications. It provides a real-time database, authentication, storage, hosting, analytics, machine learning and more.

technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: Superset of JavaScript that adds static typing and other features to the language. It is used to write the code for the project.

technologies.name: GitHub Actions
technologies.description: CI/CD service that can be used to automate the build, test and deployment of software. It is used to automatically publish the latest changes to the project.

preview.description: A simple Angular demo project to showcase the Angular framework and the Angular CLI.

details.tagline: Project to showcase the use of Angular and Firebase to build a progressive single page app.
details.description: The project was built with the use of Angular, Angular CLI, Angular Material, Angular Fire and Firebase. It is hosted and deployed on Firebase Hosting using a automated CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions to automatically publish the latest changes.
